languages.text: "Из-за своего жуткого облика немочи часто подвергаются остракизму. Пока что число случаев самосуда невелико, но их явно станет больше, когда вызванные мутацией уродства проступят более явно. Немочи склонны объединяться в группы себе подобных, средний уровень их интеллекта низок. Все они принадлежат к трудовым кастам, между собой общаются на самостоятельно изобретенном примитивном жаргоне".

"The retches are commonly ostracised due to their grotesque appearance. There haven't been too many cases of mob justice yet, but they will become commonplace after the mutation's deformities become more obvious. The retches tend to form groups with similarly afflicted people, their average level of intellect is low. They all belong to the labour caste and communicate among themselves using a primitive vernacular of their own invention."
languages.original_text: "Из-за своего жуткого облика немочи часто подвергаются остракизму. Пока что число случаев самосуда невелико, но их явно станет больше, когда вызванные мутацией уродства проступят более явно. Немочи склонны объединяться в группы себе подобных, средний уровень их интеллекта низок. Все они принадлежат к трудовым кастам, между собой общаются на самостоятельно изобретенном примитивном жаргоне".

traits.locale_text: "The wretches are commonly ostracized due to their grotesque appearance. There haven't been too many cases of mob justice just yet, but they will become commonplace after the deformities caused by the mutation become more obvious. The wretches tend to form groups with similarly afflicted people, and their intellect is low. They all belong to the labor caste and communicate among themselves using a primitive lingo of their own invention."

"The wretches are commonly ostracized due to their grotesque appearance. They all belong to the labor caste and communicate among themselves using a primitive lingo of their own invention."

languages.text: «Estos degenerados suelen ser condenados al ostracismo por su aspecto grotesco. No se han producido muchos linchamientos aún, pero conforme las deformidades de la mutación vayan quedando expuestas serán cada vez más frecuentes. Los mutantes suelen formar grupos con otra gente igualmente afectada. Son de la casta trabajadora, por lo general de intelecto reducido y se comunican con una jerga primitiva de cosecha propia».
languages.original_text: "The retches are commonly ostracised due to their grotesque appearance. There haven't been too many cases of mob justice yet, but they will become commonplace after the mutation's deformities become more obvious. The retches tend to form groups with similarly afflicted people, their average level of intellect is low. They all belong to the labour caste and communicate among themselves using a primitive vernacular of their own invention."

traits.locale_text: «Estos degenerados suelen ser condenados al ostracismo por su aspecto grotesco. No se han producido muchos linchamientos aún, pero conforme las deformidades de la mutación vayan quedando expuestas serán cada vez más frecuentes. Los mutantes suelen formar grupos con otra gente igualmente afectada. Son de la casta trabajadora, por lo general de intelecto reducido y se comunican con una jerga primitiva de cosecha propia».

languages.text: « Les infâmes sont souvent mis au ban de la société en raison de leur apparence repoussante. On dénombre peu d'exécutions sommaires à ce jour, mais leur nombre devrait augmenter à mesure que les difformités des mutants seront de plus en plus apparentes. Les infâmes ont tendance à se regrouper entre eux, et leur niveau intellectuel est généralement bas. Ils appartiennent tous à la caste ouvrière et se parlent dans un dialecte primitif de leur invention. »
languages.original_text: "The retches are commonly ostracised due to their grotesque appearance. There haven't been too many cases of mob justice yet, but they will become commonplace after the mutation's deformities become more obvious. The retches tend to form groups with similarly afflicted people, their average level of intellect is low. They all belong to the labour caste and communicate among themselves using a primitive vernacular of their own invention."

traits.locale_text: « Les infâmes sont souvent mis au ban de la société en raison de leur apparence repoussante. On dénombre peu d'exécutions sommaires à ce jour, mais leur nombre devrait augmenter à mesure que les difformités des mutants seront de plus en plus apparentes. Les infâmes ont tendance à se regrouper entre eux, et leur niveau intellectuel est généralement bas. Ils appartiennent tous à la caste ouvrière et se parlent dans un dialecte primitif de leur invention. »

languages.text: “丑恶种由于相貌怪诞而遭到排斥，不过到目前为止，还没有太多聚众私刑的情况发生。不过，当他们的突变进一步加剧之后，私刑处决可能会变得十分普遍。丑恶种往往与其他同病相怜的人聚居在一起。他们的平均智力低下，通常属于体力劳动阶层，用他们自己发明的土话进行交流。”
languages.original_text: "The retches are commonly ostracised due to their grotesque appearance. There haven't been too many cases of mob justice yet, but they will become commonplace after the mutation's deformities become more obvious. The retches tend to form groups with similarly afflicted people, their average level of intellect is low. They all belong to the labour caste and communicate among themselves using a primitive vernacular of their own invention."

traits.locale_text: “丑恶种由于相貌怪诞而遭到排斥，不过到目前为止，还没有太多聚众私刑的情况发生。不过，当他们的突变进一步加剧之后，私刑处决可能会变得十分普遍。丑恶种往往与其他同病相怜的人聚居在一起。他们的平均智力低下，通常属于体力劳动阶层，用他们自己发明的土话进行交流。”

languages.text: 「異民はそのグロテスクな外見から、排斥を受けています。暴動に至ったケースは、それほど多くはありませんが、変異体の奇妙な容姿がより巷間に膾炙すれば、そうも言ってはいられなくなるでしょう。この異民は同じような症状の人々と集団を形成する傾向があり、その平均的な知能レベルは低くなっています。彼らは、みな労働者階級に属し、自分たちで考案した原始的な言葉を使ってコミュニケーションを行ないます」
languages.original_text: "The retches are commonly ostracised due to their grotesque appearance. There haven't been too many cases of mob justice yet, but they will become commonplace after the mutation's deformities become more obvious. The retches tend to form groups with similarly afflicted people, their average level of intellect is low. They all belong to the labour caste and communicate among themselves using a primitive vernacular of their own invention."

traits.locale_text: 「異民はそのグロテスクな外見から、排斥を受けています。暴動に至ったケースは、それほど多くはありませんが、変異体の奇妙な容姿がより巷間に膾炙すれば、そうも言ってはいられなくなるでしょう。この異民は同じような症状の人々と集団を形成する傾向があり、その平均的な知能レベルは低くなっています。彼らは、みな労働者階級に属し、自分たちで考案した原始的な言葉を使ってコミュニケーションを行ないます」

languages.text: "Die Speier werden ob ihres grotesken Aussehens oft ausgegrenzt. Noch gab es nur wenige Fälle von Lynchjustiz, doch wenn die mutationsbedingten Entstellungen offensichtlicher werden, wird die Zahl zunehmen. Die Speier neigen dazu, Gruppen mit ähnlich entstellten Individuen zu bilden. Ihr durchschnittlicher Intellekt ist niedrig. Sie alle gehören der Arbeiterkaste an und kommunizieren untereinander in einer primitiven Umgangssprache, die sie selbst erfunden haben."
languages.original_text: "The retches are commonly ostracised due to their grotesque appearance. There haven't been too many cases of mob justice yet, but they will become commonplace after the mutation's deformities become more obvious. The retches tend to form groups with similarly afflicted people, their average level of intellect is low. They all belong to the labour caste and communicate among themselves using a primitive vernacular of their own invention."

languages.text: "Leşler, grotesk görünümleri nedeniyle sıklıkla dışlanıyor. Henüz çok fazla linç vakası yaşanmadı ancak mutasyonlarının şekil bozuklukları daha bariz hâle gelince linç de sıradan bir şeye dönüşecek. Leşler, benzer şekilde müteessir kişilerle grup kurma eğilimi gösteriyorlar. Ortalama zekâları düşük. Tamamı işçi sınıfına ait ve birbirleriyle kendi icatları olan ilkel bir lehçeyle iletişim kuruyorlar."
languages.original_text: "The retches are commonly ostracised due to their grotesque appearance. There haven't been too many cases of mob justice yet, but they will become commonplace after the mutation's deformities become more obvious. The retches tend to form groups with similarly afflicted people, their average level of intellect is low. They all belong to the labour caste and communicate among themselves using a primitive vernacular of their own invention."
